sample_id.description: Unique identifier for the sample within the dataset.

subject_id.description: Unique identifier for the subject from which the sample was derived.

was_derived_from.description: Unique identifier for the sample from which this sample was derived.

pool_id.description: Unique identifier for the pool to which this sample belongs.

sample_experimental_group.description: Experimental group associated with the sample.

sample_type.description: Type of sample (e.g., blood, tissue, etc.).

also_in_dataset.description: Indicates if the sample is also part of another dataset.

member_of.description: Group or cohort the sample is a member of.

metadata_only.description: Indicates whether this sample is metadata only (true or false).

laboratory_internal_id.description: Internal identifier used by the laboratory for the sample.

date_of_derivation.description: Date when the sample was derived.

experimental_log_file_path.description: Path to the experimental log file for the sample.

reference_atlas.description: Reference atlas used in the experiment.

laterality.description: Laterality of the sample (e.g., left, right, bilateral).

plane_of_section.description: Plane of section of the sample.

protocol_title.description: Title of the protocol used in the experiment.

protocol_url_or_doi.description: URL or DOI of the protocol used in the experiment.

additionalProperties.description: Additional properties for the sample. This can include any other relevant information about the sample that is not covered by the predefined fields.
